title: Anafre Mixed with Tostones
ingredients: 1 bag of Chicharrón del Rancho chopped
instructions: Step 1: In a pot we put the beans and add the quesillo to mix and melt it at the same time.
Step 2: Once the quesillo and beans are well mixed we add the chicharrones and mix them again.
Step 3: Once they are ready we transfer them to an anafre to serve with the tostones adding a dot of butter if desired.
